body: Michael Murungi says that Kenya's new constitution has set new standards for privacy and data protection: "Kenyan law on the subject remains sketchy and even with the improved level of the enjoyment of civil liberties and democratic governance that the country has experienced in the last three decades..."
original_body: Michael Murungi says that Kenya's new constitution has set new standards for privacy and data protection: "Kenyan law on the subject remains sketchy and even with the improved level of the enjoyment of civil liberties and democratic governance that the country has experienced in the last three decades..."
title: Kenya: New constitution sets new standards for privacy and data protection

sentence: Michael Murungi says that Kenya's new constitution has set new standards for privacy and data protection: "Kenyan law on the subject remains sketchy and even with the improved level of the enjoyment of civil liberties and democratic governance that the country has experienced in the last three decades..."
